desc: Tantrum Fix is an effective, award-winning kit to tame little kids' tantrums. Each kit contains a detailed step-by-step methodology for parents and a curated selection of items for the child designed to channel and help children cope with their emotions.

layout.text: READY TO SAY GOODBYE TO YOUR KIDS' TANTRUMS?
You've definitely come to the right spot. Our exclusive kit helps teach self-regulation to little kids with big emotions.
